testsuite.name: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: When I open the Search User page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Then I check if user "sam" exists, if not, I create the user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: When I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: And I navigate to the "External & Rubrics" in "External" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Then I am on the External & Rubrics page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: When I put "External Assignment 1" in the "Assignment Name" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: And I click the Save button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Then I assert that the message "External Assignment was saved successfully." appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: When I select "External Assignment 1 - External" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: And I put "sam" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: And I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: Then I assert that the grade is "-" for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: And I assert that the grade is not clickable for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments
